page.title: 20RECREATION IN ELPHINSTONE
page.content: {FISHING }A SATURDAY FISHING CLUB WAS STARTED IN THE VILLAGE SOME YEARS AGO.THE MEMBERS CATCH BROWN TROUT AND RAINBOW TROUT. THE BAITS USED ARE MAGGOTS,WORMS AND FISHING FLIES. {FOOTBALL} THERE IS A FOOTBALL GROUND IN THE VILLAGE. THE TEAM,ELPHINSTONE PRIMROSE,PRACTISE ON MONDAY EVENINGS AND MATCHES ARE PLAYED ON SATURDAYS. THE VILLAGE SCHOOL HAS A FIVE-A-SIDE TEAM. THEY PLAY IN A GREEN AND YELLOW STRIP. {CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING} SHOOTS ARE HELD ON SUNDAYS. ABOUT THIRTY PEOPLE TAKE PART. BOYS HELP TO SET UP THE TRAPS. THE MEN USE AIR RIFLES TO SHOOT AT THE TARGETS. {FERRETS} MANY OF THE VILLAGERS KEEP FERRETS.SOME ARE USED TO HUNT RABBITS,OTHERS ARE KEPT AS PETS. THEY MAKE GOOD PETS AND ARE NOT ALWAYS AS VICIOUS AS PEOPLE THINK. .
